scripts.deploy:mainnet: npm run prepare:mainnet && npx graph deploy --debug  --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/  cryptninja/orders-pl
scripts.deploy:kovan: npm run prepare:kovan && npx graph deploy --debug  --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/  cryptninja/orders-pl-kovan
